mapper.sql: SELECT t.id id, t.parent_id parentId, t.cust_id custId, t.trade_type tradeType, t.busi_type busiType, t.amount amount, t.mchn mchn, t.seq_no seqNo, t.busi_no busiNo, t.trade_state tradeState, t.trade_result tradeResult, t.trade_type tradeType, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime FROM t_gq_fss_bonus t
